topic: 2. Which of the following is not necessary to apply agility to a software process?
options: Eliminate the use of project planning and testing
Only essential work products are produced
Process allows team to streamline tasks
topic_cn: 2. 下列哪一项在将敏捷性应用于软件过程时不是必需的？
options_cn: 消除项目规划和测试的使用
只产出必要的工作产品
过程允许团队简化任务
采用增量式产品交付策略
